jobDescription: Northrop Grumman Technology Services sector is seeking highly skilled XML Data Management Analyst 2/3 to join our team of qualified, diverse individuals in defining the future.  This job will be located at a client site in Washington, DC. The site is near Dupont Circle, Foggy Bottom and Georgetown and will be supporting mission-critical systems to meet important new regulatory requirements.  The ideal candidates will have a working knowledge of XML, XSD, and XML schemas, as well as knowledge of data modeling, standards conformity assessment, standards development organizations, scripting languages, and Microsoft Excel.
